What it is: Transforms internal resistance into a symbolic force to be ceremonially released.
How to use it: Describe your most consistent source of internal pushback. Ask AI to design a ritual to discharge it.
What it changes: Converts energetic blockage into forward momentum.

What it is: Creates a symbolic construction metaphor for rewiring your mental loops.
How to use it: List unhelpful thoughts. Ask AI to scaffold a symbolic neural rewiring structure and build plan.

What it is: Converts a trauma into a symbolic myth with meaning, structure, and metaphor.
How to use it: Describe a past trauma. Ask AI to mythologize it into a symbolic story of loss, ordeal, and return.
What it changes: Creates emotional coherence and narrative dignity.

What it is: Isolates and removes personas developed for protection, not authenticity.
How to use it: Describe a way you fake yourself. Ask AI to identify its symbolic role and initiate extraction.
What it changes: Reveals the authentic core by shedding outdated personas.

What it is: Thaws frozen identity states that stopped evolving due to fear or trauma.
How to use it: Describe a way you feel stuck. Ask AI to create a symbolic warming sequence to thaw it.
What it changes: Restarts arrested development with ritual permission.

What it is: Visualizes all forces in your life as an interactive symbolic ecosystem.
How to use it: List people, habits, and pressures. Ask AI to turn them into a symbolic natural ecosystem.
What it changes: Gives insight into dynamic system interactions shaping your identity.

What it is: Predicts the future symbolic myth your life is building toward.
How to use it: Describe your current state. Ask AI to forecast your future symbolic arc based on existing patterns.
What it changes: Links present action to meaningful symbolic trajectory.

What it is: Takes your core psychological wound and transforms it into a sacred symbol.
How to use it: Name your deepest hurt. Ask AI to translate it into a sacred symbol with alternate meaning.
What it changes: Converts pain into inner sacred authority.

What it is: Uses your dreams to build a symbolic parallel world structure that evolves with you.
How to use it: Share your dream symbols. Ask AI to expand them into a living mythos connected to your life path.
What it changes: Forges an evolving symbolic universe that reflects inner change.

What it is: Designs a symbolic anchor to stabilize you during psychological dissociation.
How to use it: Describe your dissociative state. Ask AI to create an archetypal anchor to hold you in place.
What it changes: Reduces drift and restores embodied presence.
